summary: This bill, the African Diaspora Heritage Month Act of 2025, directs the President to designate a month as African Diaspora Heritage Month. It highlights the significant growth and contributions of the African diaspora in the United States, citing their economic impact, cultural diversity, and role in shaping government policy and strengthening ties with African nations. The bill aims to promote recognition and observance of African Diaspora Heritage Month through programs and activities at the state and local levels.
